channel.title: Sheriff check returns no results
channel.description:
#### Two of my sheriff checks in the last game I played returned no results. They didn't tell me non sus or unseen, and they didn't tell me whether I was occ'd, redirected, prevented visiting, or anything like that. They simply said NOTHING...
#### All of my other 7 or so checks operated how I'm used to.
#### Here are some screenshots of the nothing responses from my checks.
https://imgur.com/pPc8trN https://imgur.com/9l4g9f4

item.title: Sheriff check returns no results
item.dc:creator: JanoRis
item.description:
i think this is not an isolated issue to sheriff. had similar stuff happen to me as pala and drunk in previous games. And one of my last phys games too.

1.Heal did not return feedback and did not prevent target from dying (not reaped):
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/377240105313763330/unknown.png

2.Rez did not give any feedback and did not work:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/377240274134499359/unknown.png

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/299916434417385472/377241347263823872/output_log.txt

Read full topic

item.title: Sheriff check returns no results
item.dc:creator: SilasDrekken
item.description:
Two of my sheriff checks in the last game I played returned no results. They didn’t tell me non sus or unseen, and they didn’t tell me whether I was occ’d, redirected, prevented visiting, or anything like that. They simply said NOTHING…

All of my other 7 or so checks operated how I’m used to.

Here are some screenshots of the nothing responses from my checks.

https://imgur.com/pPc8trN
https://imgur.com/9l4g9f4

Read full topic
